item.title: Resume
item.description: https://www.linkedin.com/in/pstas/ Summary Seasoned product technologist with over 15 years of experience in software engineering, management and solutions architecture Strong written and verbal ability to communicate with staff at all levels within an organization Comfortable with organizing and driving collaboration of cross-functional distributed teams Ability to apply strong technical and analytical skills to satisfy business requirements and deliver projects within budget Problem solver with “can-do” attitude and strong ability to consistently meet deadlines Excellent technical project management/coordination skills with over 10 years of hands-on experience in working according to Agile methodologies Experienced in several programming languages and mobile frameworks Skills Non-technical: Product management, project sizing, R&D and estimation, team staffing, distributed team management, business analysis and requirements clarification, delivery management, demo preparation, pre-sales, reporting, coaching and mentorship, public speaking.
